startUrls.title: Start URLs
startUrls.description: List of URLs that will be scraped or crawled. Can be main website URL, category/search URLs or detail/product URLs.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Limit of home detail pages to be scraped

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: The best option is usually Automatic proxy. But you can also use your own proxies or no proxy
